description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fmkco","text":"On 26 November 2021 WHO designated a new variant of concern B.1.1.529 named Omicron. This variant has a large number of mutations, some of which are concerning. Preliminary evidence suggests an increased risk of reinfection with this variant and reduced neutralization by convalescent and vaccinated sera, as compared to other VOCs. Implementation of the high-throughput rRT-PCR screening for Omicron is of great importance for monitoring the spread of this VOC in the population, especially in resource-limited countries lacking sufficient sequencing capacity.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mgqj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd7kp","text":"Omicron lineage B.1.1.529 (BA.1) has some indels that turned out to be a good target for its detection. In the current protocol, we use ins214EPE for this purpose. Here we describe the 1-step quantitative multiplex RT-qPCR assay consisting of the newly developed Ins214EPE detection set and widely used Hong Kong University N gene assay for SARS-CoV-2 detection (Chu et al., 2020).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":363,"length":16}],"data":{}},{"key":"cv6gf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgidm","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3v0lo","text":"The assay was validated on the Omicron variant RNA kindly provided by the Pathogenic Microorganisms Variability Laboratory (Dr. Vladimir Guschin, Gamaleya Institute, Moscow, Russia) and RNA from the collection of Smorodintsev Research Institute of Influenza. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvj4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6i7d3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1habh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bsfm9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5hel","text":"Omicron RNA specimens were positive in the assay as expected. Negative controls were found negative. 10-fold serial dilutions of Omicron RNA were used to assess ins214EPE assay amplification efficiency. The amplification efficiency was 98,9% (R2 = 0,99).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":244,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en9te","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7lrs","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f50er","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cgfki","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dbv7","text":"The developed rRT-PCR assay demonstrates high specificity. It was tested on 26 clinical samples (RNA extracted from oropharyngeal swabs) with previously characterized viruses belonging to 8 different SARS-CoV-2 lineages (including Delta B.1.617.2+AY.*) Specific signal was detected only in samples with SARS-CoV-2 Omicron lineage RNA (confirmed by whole-genome sequencing). Specificity was additionally tested on clinical samples positive for other respiratory viruses from the collection of Smorodintsev Research Institute of Influenza - influenza, parainfluenza, human seasonal coronaviruses (OC43, NL63, 229E, HKU1), hRSV, rhinoviruses, bocaviruses, metapneumovirus (33 in total) - with no false-positive results.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d83kf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a03g","text":"      4x  AY.122          P.1          B.1.1.529  28,72       B.1.1.529  26,29 {"blocks":[{"key":"36hq5","text":"Perform the amplification in a qPCR thermocycler with appropriate temperature profile:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo1v4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m4nu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bofc4","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3lanb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B8AF12F05C3B11ECA624653AFDA341CD","height":243,"id":193645,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8qrmo","text":"Read a plate at the annealing and elongation step in FAM and ROX channels. Developed rRT-PCR assay was validated for Bio-Rad CFX96, but is believed to work well at any device.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7drbkgn7.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7dpbkgn7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7dqbkgn7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7dnbkgn7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ede7","text":"How to interpret the results: detection of fluorescence of FAM probe (HKU-NP) means thepresence of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in the sample, detection of fluorescence in ROX channel (Ins214EPE probe) means the presence of B.1.1.529 (BA.1)(omicron) RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5844b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epelr","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ah3g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E88FE390601011ECA5951D687C0C59C9","height":303,"id":193649,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3jo6k","text":"Amplification curves  (HKU SARS-CoV-2 N-gene assay - blue, ins214EPE assay - orange)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"21cdac47-a97e-4ced-9626-cb6ba37f29d4.jpg","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7dvbkgn7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7dtbkgn7.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7dubkgn7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f7dsbkgn7.webp","width":489}}}}
